title: 140 - The Future is Fiat | Noah Smith (Noahpinion)
itunes:title: 140 - The Future is Fiat | Noah Smith (Noahpinion)
description:
✨ DEBRIEF | Unpacking the Episode:
https://shows.banklesshq.com/p/debrief-noah 

-----

Noah Smith is a writer economist, with fiercely independent takes that he articulates with precision and clarity. We see him as a knowledgable crypto outsider, which is a rare trait we've seen throughout the posts on his blog, Noahpinion.

In today's episode, we cover geopolitics in broad strokes—Noah thinks we're already at war in the form of an economic showdown between the New Allies and New Axis.

We also turn to crypto, where Noah gives his bull case while also addressing some misconceptions he sees in the crypto community.

The sum of all of this is an episode title we thought we'd never see on Bankless—The Future is Fiat.

------
